hotels.title: Bold Washington DC Art Hotel near Logan Circle with Rooftop Pool
hotels.description: Leave ordinary at the door the moment you enter Hotel Zena, A Viceroy Urban Retreat in Washington DC, a ‘herstory’-defining hotel located on vibrant 14th Street, near Logan Circle. In an area already buzzing with renowned chef-helmed restaurants and stylish bars, this eclectic hotel is poised to spark conversation. Its powerful 8,000-piece art collection, simply titled ‘Her’, guarantees it. Enter and be blown away by thought-provoking art that leaves room for contemplation, luxurious settings that invite relaxation and a location that affords easy access to DC’s most storied and iconic locations. Discover U Street, The White House and thriving Logan Circle, packed with shops, galleries and distilleries, then return to the hotel and enjoy craft cocktails with a modern twist at Figleaf Bar & Lounge or Hedy's Rooftop (seasonal), where a pool and bar await.
